title: Harley Davidson XL 1200 Sportster Custom  '00
description: Specs - Manufacturer: Harley Davidson - Model: Sportster Custom 1200 - Year of rebuild: 2012 - Frame Modifications: Frame cleaned up, tail remade - Bodywork: Yamaha XT 500 modified tank, custom seat - Motor: Standard engine, finned engine, - Exhaust: 2-1 handmade exhaust, universal muffler - Front Suspension/Fork: Harley Davidson forklegs - Rear Suspension/Shocks: Progressive shocks - Tires/Wheels: Front 19" x 3.5" spoke wheel, rear 18" x 5.5", spoke wheel WM ,Avon roadrunner brand new tires - Brakes: Harley Davidson standard calipers front and rear with high Pressure Tube - Hand Controls/Handlebars: Magura - Foot Controls: ReaΡset footpegs custom by chainsikle - Paint: Blue fire tank - The bike has brand new tires, front and rear. - Both filter oil and oil was changed a week ago. - The break pads (front and rear) and the battery are brand new and changed as well. - The bike is in excellent condition, really well looked after and kept in a garage. - A six months warranty is also provided after sale. - Η μηχανή έχει ολοκαίνουργια ελαστικά, μπροστά και πίσω. - Έχουν αλλαχτεί το φίλτρο λαδιού και λάδια πριν από μία εβδομάδα. - Τα τακάκια (εμπρός πίσω) και η μπαταρία είναι καίνουργια επίσης. - Είναι σε άριστη κατάσταση, και φυλάσσεται σε γκαράζ. - Δεκτός κάθε έλεγχος. - Δίδεται εγγύηση 6 μηνών. - Less -
